description: This file defines a React component called NotesPage that manages the display, creation, editing, and deletion of notes. It interacts with custom hooks and various child components to facilitate note management functionality within a user interface.
external_methods: ConfirmDialog (props: title, message, confirmLabel, cancelLabel, confirmType, onConfirm, onCancel)

methods.name: NotesPage()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the notes management interface, including creating, listing, editing, and deleting notes.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Handles creating a new note by invoking addNote from useNotes.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Sets the current note being edited.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Sets the note ID to be confirmed for deletion.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Performs the deletion of the note after user confirmation.
